family_oriented.reason: The site lacks interactive or family-focused features, appealing more to adults or older children with an interest in history.

history_oriented.reason: The grave is deeply rooted in history, being the burial place of Benjamin Franklin, with informational plaques and proximity to other historic landmarks.

activity_oriented.reason: The activity level is low, as visiting the grave involves minimal physical exertion and is primarily contemplative.

nature_oriented.reason: The site is in an urban setting with limited natural scenery, focusing on historical and cultural aspects.

food_oriented.reason: There is no food-related focus or nearby eateries mentioned as part of the experience.

shopping_oriented.reason: The site does not include shopping components or souvenir shops.
